item.title: Israel-Tied Predatory Sparrow Hackers Are Waging Cyberwar on Iran's Financial System
item.description: After an attack on Iran's Sepah bank, the hyper-aggressive Israel-linked hacker group has now destroyed more than $90 million held at Iranian crypto e...

item.title: Hackers steal and destroy millions from Iran’s largest crypto exchange
item.description: It's the latest cyberattack on Iran claimed by a pro-Israeli hacking group since the latest flare up in tensions between the two countries.

item.title: Dell 32 Plus QD-OLED Review: HDR and OLED Dream
item.description: Dell’s buttoned-up OLED monitor beautifully brings HDR to PC monitors at a reasonable price.

item.title: Grifin secures $11M to make investing less intimidating for its female user base
item.description: Investment app Grifin secured a $11 million Series A funding round.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Glasses (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: This burgeoning wearable tech category lets you dabble in augmented reality, virtual screens, and AI assistants right on your face.
